rukus.text: 56|39|Dar ʙoƣhoi purne'mat [-i ʙihist coj dorand]
56|40|ki ʙarxe az onon dar zumrai pesinijon va ʙarxe digar dar zumrai mutaaxxiron hastand
56|41|Va [ammo] tiraʙaxton; ci tiraʙaxtone
56|42|Dar mijoni ʙodi zahrogin va oʙi cuson qaror dorand
56|43|Va sojahoe az dudi sijoh
56|44|ki na xunuk ast va na xus
56|45|Onon dar dunjo sarvatmandu sarkas ʙudand
56|46|Va ʙar gunohi ʙuzurg [-i sirk] isror mevarzidand
56|47|Va meguftand: «Ojo hangome ki murdem va xoku ustuxon sudem, ʙarangexta xohem sud
56|48|Ojo nijokoni mo niz [ʙarangexta mesavand]?»
56|49|[Ej Pajomʙar, ʙa kofiron] Bigu: «Be tardid, guzastagon va ojandagon
56|50|hama dar va'dagohi qijomat cam' xohand sud»
56|51|On goh sumo, ej gumrohoni takziʙkunanda
56|52|Hatman, az [mevai] daraxti zaqum xohed xurd
56|53|Va sikamhoro az on anʙosta mekuned
56|54|On goh ruji on oʙi cuson menused
56|55|Hamcun suturoni tasna
56|56|In paziroii onon dar ruzi cazost
56|57|Moem, ki sumoro [az hec] ofaridaem; pas, caro [ofarinisi duʙoraro] ʙovar nadored
56|58|Ojo ʙa nutfae, ki [dar rahimi hamsaronaton] merezed, tavaccuh kardaed
56|59|Ojo sumo onro meofarined jo mo ofarinandaas hastem
56|60|Mo dar mijoni sumo margro muqaddar kardem va notavon nestem
56|61|ki amsoli sumoro cojguzin [-i xudaton] kunem va sumoro ʙa gunae ki az on ʙexaʙared, [dar ofarinise nav] padid ovarem
56|62|Sumo, ki az ofarinisi naxustin ʙa ravsani ogoh sudaed, caro [ʙa jodi oxirat nameafted va] pand namegired
56|63|Ojo ʙa donahoe, ki mekored, tavaccuh kardaed
56|64|Ojo sumo hasted, ki onro merujoned jo Mo rujonandaem
56|65|Agar mexostem, xosokas mekardem; cunon ki sigiftzada saved
56|66|[Va cunon noʙudas mekardem, ki ʙigued] «Mo zijon kardaem
56|67|ʙalki hama cizro az dast dodaem
56|68|Ojo ʙa oʙe, ki menused, tavaccuh kardaed
56|69|Ojo sumo onro az aʙr furu ʙorided jo Mo furuʙorandai on hastem
56|70|Agar mexostem, onro suru talx mekardem, pas, caro sipos nameguzored
56|71|Ojo ʙa otase, ki meafruzed, tavaccuh kardaed
56|72|Ojo sumo daraxtasro ofaridaed Mo ofaridaem
56|73|Mo in otasro vasilai jodovarii [azoʙi duzax] va mojai ʙarxurdori [va rohatii] musofiron qaror dodaem
56|74|Pas, [ej Pajomʙar,] ʙa nomi Parvardigori ʙuzurgat tasʙeh gu [va Uro ʙa poki jod kun]
